SEARCH
Package oogasalad.engine.controller.camerafactory

Class TrackerCameraFactory

java.lang.Object
oogasalad.engine.controller.camerafactory.TrackerCameraFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
CameraFactory
public class TrackerCameraFactory extends Object implements CameraFactory
TrackerCameraFactory is a CameraFactory implementation that produces TrackerCamera instances.

This factory expects the CameraData to include a string property with key "objectToTrack" that refers to a GameObject in the game. The corresponding ImmutableGameObject is set on the created TrackerCamera so that the camera can follow the target during gameplay.

If the required tracking object is not provided or cannot be found, the factory will throw a runtime exception to signal invalid configuration.

See Also:
  • TrackerCamera
  • CameraData
  • GameObject
  • ImmutableGameObject

  • Method Details

    • create

      public Camera create(CameraData cameraData, Map<String,GameObject> gameObjectMap)
      Creates a TrackerCamera configured to follow a specific GameObject.

      It looks for the key "objectToTrack" in the CameraData's string properties. The corresponding GameObject must be present in the provided gameObjectMap. If found, the camera will track the converted ImmutableGameObject of that game object.

      Specified by:
      create in interface CameraFactory
      Parameters:
      cameraData - the data used to configure the camera
      gameObjectMap - the available game objects in the level, indexed by ID
      Returns:
      a fully initialized TrackerCamera
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the target object is not found in the map
      NoSuchElementException - if the camera data doesn't include a target to track

    • makeTrackerCamera

      private TrackerCamera makeTrackerCamera(CameraData cameraData, Map<String,GameObject> gameObjectMap)
